https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fYugwxjJnMNUwFZrD0GrMLozFnA.jpg Set in Baku at the turn of the 20th century, a young successful businessman Asgar wishes to marry. He wants his bride to be the choice of his heart, however, Azerbaijani tradition restricted him from communicating with the lady as a lover before marriage. So Asgar decides to disguise himself as a mere cloth peddler and the young woman Gulchohra falls in love with him. Arshin Takes a Wife
